### W6897-240077: Painting Services Standing Offer

#### Contract Details
Original Posting Date: April 5, 2024
Tender Closing Date: May 7, 2024, 14:00 hours EST
Modification Number: 0
Solicitation Reference: WS4507872635

#### Contract particulars

This Standing Offer Contract is for Painting Services to be provided to the Canadian Armed Forces at the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Suffield, located in Ralston, Alberta.

The Standing Offer will be issued for a period of two (2) years with three (3) one-year option periods.

#### Contract Requirements
The Contractor shall provide skilled labour, tools, equipment, supervision and materials to support interior and exterior painting services, as required by the Department of National Defence.

This Standing Offer contains mandatory requirements.

#### Selection Criteria
The lowest price shall be the sole factor in determining the successful bidder.

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Notice Information

For more information, please refer to:
* Part 4: Evaluation Procedures and Basis of Selection
* Part 5: Certifications and Additional Information

#### Contact Details

Name: Dela Cruz, El (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: el.delacruz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

The review of this document is the responsibility of potential bidders.

Submission of offer is underway and will be closed on the above noted date and time. All offers received after the above noted closing time will be considered non-responsive.
